oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Appalachian Exposition postcard
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: No. 255. Lake at Chilhowee Park, near Knoxville, Tenn. Appalachian Exposition. Pub. by Monroe Howard. Unused. Shows man in woman in front of lake, people and buildings in background. Ca. 1910.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Postcards; Exhibitions; Fairs; Parks; Lakes & ponds;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
